q17.question: What happens when Will tries to pay off Ed and his sons?
q17.answer: ['They attack him in a bathroom stall']
q17.recall: When Will tries to pay off Ed and his sons, they attack him in a bathroom stall.
q17.vectordb: When Will tries to pay off Ed and his sons, they attack him in a bathroom stall. They take the money but still refuse to let Will off the hook. Will strikes an agreement with them to perform for them in a motel room, but secretly plans to ambush and murder them with the help of Syd. However, when the time comes, Will finds himself unable to kill them. A shootout ensues with another person who breaks into the room to rob them. Ed's son accidentally shoots himself, and Ed's other son and the robber shoot each other to death. Ed panics and Will chases him through the motel parking lot, but Ed drops dead of a heart attack. Will retrieves the tape and gives it to Syd to destroy. Will then goes back to hosting his children's television show.
